content: Michele Bachmann, as with all Trump supporters, needs to face facts: if she wants to spout off about an “Anti-Christ”, the finger is better pointed to Trump and his henchmen. There isn’t a true follower of Jesus among them for all their hypocritical “scripture” recitals. Their policies against most of the citizens of this country show that — they are all hateful. Miss Michele is just another Trump/Republican mouthpiece spouting lies and making up conspiracy stories. She’s a disgrace to women and the true practice of Christianity.
